# yamanoku.net

> yamanoku.net is Okuto Oyama's portal site.

## Languages

- [日本語](https://yamanoku.net)
- [English](https://yamanoku.net/en/)

## Basic Info

- Real name: Okuto Oyama
- Hundle name: Oyama Michinoku, yamanoku
- Birthday: October 30, 1989
- Sex: Male
- Birthplace: Noshiro, Akita
- Location: Nagareyama, Chiba
- Family: Wife, daughter, 3 cats and a large dog
- Organization: Schoo Inc.

## Open Source Activity

> In addition to working for a company, I have been contributing to open source since 2020 in my spare time. I translate documents, propose accessibility improvements, respond to fixes, and make other minor corrections.

- [Open Source Activity All Logs](https://yamanoku.notion.site/170f2fefa69c80959582f75f6e5b4b3f)
- [Open Source Activity Log 2025](https://yamanoku.notion.site/2025-6415641600a749d58ae57cb39f1bdbbb)
- [Open Source Activity Log 2024](https://yamanoku.notion.site/2024-170f2fefa69c80c1a13dfe86d477010e)
- [Open Source Activity Log 2023](https://yamanoku.notion.site/2023-9c066732fb5f40aa92dc19602047b445)
- [Open Source Activity Log 2022](https://yamanoku.notion.site/2022-0c6dae397ac8424ebd626d06afd822b8)
- [Open Source Activity Log 2021](https://yamanoku.notion.site/2021-2c4fa51b832645f494698ebd11e069f9)

### Donate & Sponsor

> If you are interested in my work, presentations and activities, you can donate me by.

- [GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/yamanoku)
- [Stripe Payment Links](https://buy.stripe.com/00gaEY1Eh5bE7VC8ww)
- [Buy me a coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com/yamanoku)

## Daily journal

> I utilize Helpfeel Cosense to compile daily events and interesting news in the form of a journal. Rather than updating daily, I post whenever inspiration strikes.

- [nippo-2025](https://scrapbox.io/yamanoku/nippo-2025)
- [nippo-2024](https://scrapbox.io/yamanoku/nippo-2024)
- [nippo-2023](https://scrapbox.io/yamanoku/nippo-2023)
- [nippo-2022](https://scrapbox.io/yamanoku/nippo-2022)
- [nippo-2021](https://scrapbox.io/yamanoku/nippo-2021)
